1548 pars of decis tabl reduct in the size of decis tabl can be accomplish by sever techniqu the techniqu consid in thi paper ar on the pars of decis tabl with regard to horizont and vertic data structur job ident hardwar and job prioriti and context relationship such pars rest upon some convent for the linkag of decis tabl cacm august 1967 chapin n ca670807 jb februari 27 1978 4 14 pm 1548 4 1548 1548 4 1548 2220 4 1548 2726 4 1548 2726 4 1548 1488 5 1548 1489 5 1548 1548 5 1548 1548 5 1548 1548 5 1548 2220 5 1548 2492 5 1548 2518 5 1548 2598 5 1548 2616 5 1548 2726 5 1548 931 6 1548 1172 6 1548 1172 6 1548 1172 6 1548 1237 6 1548 1327 6 1548 1327 6 1548 1354 6 1548 1354 6 1548 1488 6 1548 1489 6 1548 1489 6 1548 1548 6 1548 1548 6 1548 1548 6 1548 1548 6 1548 1548 6 1548 1548 6 1548 1684 6 1548 1684 6 1548 250 6 1548 2220 6 1548 2220 6 1548 2221 6 1548 2263 6 1548 2263 6 1548 2453 6 1548 2517 6 1548 2691 6 1548
